revised_title: Description and Observations of the Nyl-Ghau, an Indian Animal
tldr: The author provides a detailed description and observations of the Nyl-Ghau, an Indian animal not previously described. The Nyl-Ghau is a large, unique animal with characteristics of both cattle and deer. It has a distinctive appearance, including a mix of black and white hair, long and slender neck, and a tail with black and white hair. The author also discusses the animal's behavior, diet, and habitat.
